data.text: @loafnw When he talked about the loon, I envisioned someone yelling that vaccines don't work and that masks were tyranny... That's how the pandemic has re-defined "loon" for me. :-p
@CIDRAP @mtosterholm @cvdall Thank you to @mtosterholm, DJ Chris Dall and all the @cidrap team for this particularly excellent episode! https://t.co/3kQ0w9ipwx
@CIDRAP @mtosterholm @cvdall Mike should broadcast from his fancy new condo. Fear porn pays!
